inclusion.criterion: Medical diagnosis of chronic cervical pain (more than 3 months of cervical pain evolution)
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Recent spine, head or mouth surgery.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Recent infection and/or inflammatory arthritis, and cervical and/or brain traumatism
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Contraindication for manual therapy or cervical training
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Richter's transformation, which may be a contraindication for manual therapy or cervical training.
